Class SecSignerAppletCertCheck

java.lang.Object

                      seccommerce.secsigner.applet.SecSignerApplet

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, SmartCardInsertionCertListener
public class SecSignerAppletCertCheck
extends SecSignerApplet
implements SmartCardInsertionCertListener

SecSigner applet which sends the signature certificate from an inserted card to SecPKI for verification before using the certificate.

Version:
$Id: SecSignerAppletCertCheck.java,v 1.12 2014/05/01 15:56:22 tk Exp $
Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg

Method Detail

smartCardInsertedCert

public void smartCardInsertedCert(byte[] sigCert,
                                  byte[] authCert,
                                  byte[] decryptCert)
                           throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
This method is called by SecSignerMgrAbstract right after a smart card has been inserted and its certificates have been read. First the class implementing this interface has to call SearchSmartCardThread.setSmartCardInsertionListener()

Specified by:
smartCardInsertedCert in interface SmartCardInsertionCertListener
Parameters:
sigCert - signature certificate
authCert - authentification certificate
decryptCert - decrypt certificate (optional)
Throws:
java.beans.PropertyVetoException
